exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="AppListLItemRendererUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="up,down" >
	<e:Group scaleX.down="0.95" scaleY.down="0.95" horizontalCenter.down="0" horizontalCenter="0" top="0">
		<e:Group top="0" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:Image id="e_imgItem" height="200" width="200" top="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="logo_jpg" smoothing="true"/>
			<e:Image height="200" width="200" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" source="template_round100_png" smoothing="true"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:BasicLayout/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="e_nameWordLabel" text="孩子的能力教育" width="200" size="20" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="黑体" maxHeight="40" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="-14"/>
		
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="top" gap="3"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="e_typeWordLabel" text="教育生活" size="12" textColor="0x8D8D95" width="200" fontFamily="黑体" maxHeight="26" textColor.down="0x2741A0" y="250" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="AppRankingListItemRenderUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group top="0" left="0" bottom="0" right="0">
		<e:Group x="3">
			<e:Image id="e_firstIconImg" height="88" width="88" x="0" y="0" source="logo_jpg"/>
			<e:Image height="88" width="88" source="template_round66_png"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="100" y="2">
			<e:Label id="e_nameLabel" text="应用的名字" textColor="0x000000" size="16" fontFamily="微软雅黑" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="118"/>
			<e:Label id="e_typeLabel" text="教育" size="12" width="118" textColor="0x574848" fontFamily="微软雅黑" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="top" gap="4"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameListItemRendererUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="960" height="640">
	<e:Image id="e_img" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="1_jpg" width="100%" x="0" y="0" height="100%"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HListScrollBarUISkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0" source="scroller_roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,2,12,12"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="VListScrollBarUISkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0" scale9Grid="3,2,11,12" source="scroller_list_bar_png"/>	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ListScrollerBarUISkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0" skinName="HListScrollBarUISkin"/>
	<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0" skinName="VListScrollBarUISkin"/>	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="IOSIndexPageUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Scroller id="e_appTableScroller" scrollPolicyV="on" scrollPolicyH="off" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" skinName="ListScrollerBarUISkin">
		<e:List id="e_appTableList" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="AppListLItemRendererUISkin">
			<e:layout>
				<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="20" horizontalAlign="center" columnAlign="justifyUsingWidth" rowAlign="top" paddingTop="15" verticalAlign="top" verticalGap="20" paddingRight="15" paddingLeft="15" paddingBottom="15"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:List>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="IOSRankingIndexPageUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Scroller left="0" top="0" right="0" bottom="0" scrollPolicyH="off" scrollPolicyV="on" skinName="ListScrollerBarUISkin">
		<e:List id="e_appTableList" top="0" left="0" right="0" bottom="30">
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="10"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:List>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="NavigateButtonUISkin" states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" minHeight="50" minWidth="100">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
	        
	         source="bg_toggle_normal_png" scale9Grid="21,10,80,27" source.down="bg_toggle_selected_png" scale9Grid.down="19,10,80,27" source.disabled="bg_toggle_selected_png" scale9Grid.disabled="21,10,77,27"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
	         size="16"
	         verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="按钮模板应用" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x93460C" size.disabled="16"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainIndexCoreUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<w:Config id="1557c91d8af"/>
	<e:Image left="0" top="0" right="0" bottom="0" source="web_bg_jpg" fillMode="repeat" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group top="0" left="0" right="0" locked="true">
		<e:Image source="tilte_01_jpg" x="321" y="-3" fillMode="repeat"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="contentJustify" gap="0"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Rect left="0" top="120" right="0" height="50" fillColor="0xDDC3A2" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group top="120" left="0" right="0" locked="true">
		<e:ToggleButton id="e_btnIOS" x="459" y="57" label="推荐游戏" skinName="NavigateButtonUISkin">
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:ToggleButton id="e_btnH5" x="111" y="-2" label="小学生数学" skinName="NavigateButtonUISkin">
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:ToggleButton id="e_btnHot" x="111" y="-2" label="热门休闲游戏" skinName="NavigateButtonUISkin">
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="3" columnAlign="justifyUsingWidth" orientation="rows" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" paddingLeft="10" paddingRight="10"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="热门排行:" fontFamily="方正粗圆_GBK" textColor="0x120404" right="117" top="179" height="30" italic="true" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group id="e_scrollerArea" left="0" top="176" bottom="54" right="250">
		<e:layout>
		<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="e_currRankingArea" right="0" bottom="54" top="217" width="250">
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group bottom="4" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Label text="Copyright © 2015-2017 1ko1.com 沪ICP备14046391号" height="27" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="4" textColor="0x000000" size="15" verticalAlign="bottom" x="260" y="137" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="eid_lbl_contact" text="联系我" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="4" textColor="0x000000" size="15" verticalAlign="bottom" x="260" y="137" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:layout>
		<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="bottom"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<ns1:FingerMovieGroup id="e_fingerMovieClip" width="200" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-234" namePath="finger" nameSource="finger" locked="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainIndexGameUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" width="900" height="1040">
	<e:Rect left="0" top="0" right="0" height="50" fillColor="0xffc16a"/>
	<e:Group top="0" left="0" right="0" locked="true">
		<e:ToggleButton id="e_btnIOS0" x="459" y="57" label="推荐游戏" skinName="NavigateButtonUISkin">
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:ToggleButton id="e_btnH0" x="111" y="-2" label="更多游戏" skinName="NavigateButtonUISkin"/>
		<e:layout>
				<e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="2" columnAlign="justifyUsingWidth" orientation="rows" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" paddingLeft="10" paddingRight="10"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group left="100" top="64" bottom="54" right="100" locked="true">
		<e:layout>
		<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
		<e:Scroller top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" skinName="ListScrollerBarUISkin" scrollPolicyH="off" locked="true">
			<e:List id="e_gameList">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="16" horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="justify"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group bottom="4" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true">
		<e:Label text="Copyright © 2015-2017 1ko1.com 沪ICP备14046391号" height="27" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="4" textColor="0x000000" size="15" verticalAlign="bottom" x="260" y="137" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="eid_lbl_contact" text="" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="4" textColor="0x000000" size="15" verticalAlign="bottom" x="260" y="137" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="bottom"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<ns1:FingerMovieGroup id="e_fingerMovieClip" width="200" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-344" namePath="finger" nameSource="finger" locked="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UserScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0" skinName="LotteryVScrollBarSkin"/>
</e:Skin>
